page.title: 16Religious Beliefs - Rufforth
page.content: 95 people are members of the{Church of {England.25 attend}services regularly. The nearest Church is in{Rufforth. There are{13 Methodists, 2}attending services regularly.The nearest{Chapel is in Rufforth.There is{1 Baptist.} The nearest Church is in{Leeds.}He doesn't attend services regularly. There are{7 Roman Catholics.3}attend services regularly.The nearest{Church is in{Acomb.}There is{1 Jehovahs {witness.He}doesn't attend services regularly.The nearest{Church }is in{ {York.}There is{1 Humanist Agnostic.}He doesn't attend services.The{Church was built in{1894}with money donated by {Miss Middlewood.}The{Church}is built of{stone.}The{tower}is square. It has a spire.1 service is held every {Sunday.}About {25}people attend.The{ {Chapel }was built in{1845.}About{15 people attend every week.
